com.arjuna.mw.wsas.activity
Interface OutcomeManager

public interface OutcomeManager

When multiple HLSs are registered with the activity service, some means of collating their Outcome responses may be required.

Since:
1.0.
Version:
$Id: OutcomeManager.java,v 1.2 2003/04/04 14:59:51 nmcl Exp $
Author:
Mark Little (mark.little@arjuna.com)

Method Summary
 Outcome processOutcome(Outcome current, Outcome next)
          Given the current (composite) Outcome and the Outcome just obtained from an HLS, the OutcomeManager may return a new Outcome.
 

Method Detail

processOutcome

public Outcome processOutcome(Outcome current,
                              Outcome next)
                       throws SystemException
Given the current (composite) Outcome and the Outcome just obtained from an HLS, the OutcomeManager may return a new Outcome.
Returns:
the Oucome or null.
Throws:
SystemException - Thrown if any error occurs.
